title: How to Install a Drip Irrigation System

tasks.task: Converting a sprinkler system to a drip irrigation system.
subtasks: Close all sprinkler heads on the target station.
Remove the sprinkler head and replace it with a cap.
Convert the nearest sprinkler head to connect PVC piping to drip irrigation tubing.
Dig a trench for laying drip irrigation tubing.
Assemble the drip irrigation tubing using T-adapters and elbows.
Attach emitter tubing with 12-inch spacing and staggered positions.
Secure tubing in place using ground staples.
Create a looped system with T-adapters and connect only some lines at the end.
Install a filter and optional pressure regulator at the valve.
Flush the system to remove debris.
Turn on water and verify proper functionality.
Address any necessary maintenance after installation.
